title: Quick reference
body:
## Icons & symbols > * Find a specific coin pair * Add a coin pair to (or remove it from) your favourites * The number of exchanges from which InterTrader gathered data for a pair * The difference between the lowest and highest buy price across all exchanges * The difference between the lowest and highest sell price across all exchanges * The potential profit at the time the price was retrieved by InterTrader â€” if *greyed out*, it means there's a problem with the coin or trading pair on at least one exchange * There is a problem with the coin or the trading pair on one or more exchanges

## Glossary * **Exchange**: A Platform for trading currencies * **Intertrade**: Purchase a cryptocurrency on one exchange and sell it on another for profit * **Buy/Bid price**: The price traders are willing to pay for a cryptocurrency * **Sell/Ask price**: The price traders are willing to sell a cryptocurrency * **Buy difference (%)**: The difference between the lowest and highest bid price across all exchanges * **Sell difference (%)**: The difference between the lowest and highest ask price across all exchanges * ** Coin pair, trading pair, crypocurrency pair**: Combination of two cryptocurrencies that can be traded on an exchange
